renderpass.code:
void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u ) {
    vec2  R =  iResolution.xy,
          U = ( u+u - R ) / R.y,                                      // normalized coordinates
          V = mod(U,.33);                                             // for fringes
    U.x = abs(U.x); U.y -= .2;                                        // horizontal symmetries
    O = 1. - R.yyyy/2.
            * max( min( length(U),                                    // head
                        max( U, abs(U.y+.5) +.2-min(V,.33-V)).x       // fringes
                      ) - .5,
                   .15 - length(U-vec2(.2,0)) );                      // eyes
}





/** 

    O = 1. - R.yyyy/2.
            * max( min( length(U)-.5,                                 // head
                        max( U-.5, abs(U.y+.5) -.3-min(V,.33-V)).x ), // fringes
                   .15 - length(U-vec2(.2,0)) );                      // eyes

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
